short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to improve the UX of Jira web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to improve the UX of Jira web app. It allows to hide certain elements on the dashboard which take precious real estate on small screens. Each piece can be toggled to hide/show separately.

[NEW] Bug fixes for latest jira web version
